Detailed Description

Arithmetic and Logic Unit.

The alu module is responsible for performing all of the arithmetic and logic operations of the ao68000 processor. It operates on two 32-bit registers: operand1 and operand2 from the registers module. The output is saved into a result 32-bit register. This register is located in the alu module.

The alu module also contains the status register (SR) with the condition code register. The microcode decides what operation the alu performs.

Definition at line 2547 of file ao68000.v.

Member Function Documentation

reset_n )

02667     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin

02681             `ALU_SR_SET_TRAP: begin

02691             `ALU_MOVEP_M2R_1: begin
02692                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[31:24] <= operand1[7:0];

02732             `ALU_SIGN_EXTEND: begin
02733                 // move operand1 with sign-extension to result
02734                 if(size == 2'b01) begin
02735                     result <= { {16{operand1[15]}}, operand1[15:0] };

02738                     result <= operand1;

02743             `ALU_ARITHMETIC_LOGIC: begin
02744 
02745                 // OR,OR to mem,OR to Dn
02746                 if(         (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b000) ||
02747                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1000)
02748                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] | operand2[31:0];
02749                 // AND,AND to mem,AND to Dn
02750                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b001) ||
02751                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1100)
02752                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] & operand2[31:0];
02753                 // EORI,EOR
02754                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b101) ||
02755                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] != 3'b001)
02756                 )            result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] ^ operand2[31:0];
02757                 // ADD,ADD to mem,ADD to Dn,ADDQ
02758                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b011) ||
02759                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101) ||
02760                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0)
02761                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
02762                 // SUBI,CMPI,CMPM,SUB to mem,SUB to Dn,CMP,SUBQ
02763                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b010) ||
02764                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110) ||
02765                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001)     ||
02766                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) ||
02767                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010)) ||
02768                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1)
02769                 )            result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
02770 
02771                 // Z
02772                 sr[2] <= `Z;
02773                 // N
02774                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
02775 
02776                 // CMPI,CMPM,CMP
02777                 if( (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110) ||
02778                     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001) ||
02779                     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010))
02780                 ) begin
02781                     // C,V
02782                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02783                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02784                     // X not affected
02785                 end
02786                 // ADDI,ADD to mem,ADD to Dn,ADDQ
02787                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b011) ||
02788                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101) ||
02789                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0)
02790                 ) begin
02791                     // C,X,V
02792                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm);
02793                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm); //=ccr[0];
02794                     sr[1] <= (`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (~`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02795                 end
02796                 // SUBI,SUB to mem,SUB to Dn,SUBQ
02797                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b010) ||
02798                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) ||
02799                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1)
02800                 ) begin
02801                     // C,X,V
02802                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02803                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
02804                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02805                 end
02806                 // ANDI,EORI,ORI,EOR,OR to mem,AND to mem,OR to Dn,AND to Dn
02807                 else begin
02808                     // C,V
02809                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
02810                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
02811                     // X not affected
02812                 end
02813             end
02814 
02815             `ALU_ABCD_SBCD_ADDX_SUBX: begin // 259 LE
02816                 // ABCD
02817                 if( ir[14:12] == 3'b100 ) begin
02818                     result[13:8] = {1'b0, operand1[3:0]} + {1'b0, operand2[3:0]} + {4'b0, sr[4]};
02819                     result[19:14] = {1'b0, operand1[7:4]} + {1'b0, operand2[7:4]};
02820                     
02821                     result[31:23] = operand1[7:0] + operand2[7:0] + {7'b0, sr[4]};
02822                     
02823                     result[13:8] = (result[13:8] > 6'd9) ? (result[13:8] + 6'd6) : result[13:8];
02824                     result[19:14] = (result[13:8] > 6'h1F) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd2) :
02825                                     (result[13:8] > 6'h0F) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd1) :
02826                                     result[19:14];
02827                     result[19:14] = (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd6) : result[19:14];
02828                     
02829                     result[7:4] = result[17:14];
02830                     result[3:0] = result[11:8];
02831                     
02832                     // C
02833                     sr[0] <= (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02834                     // X = C
02835                     sr[4] <= (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02836                     
02837                     // V
02838                     sr[1] <= (result[30] == 1'b0 && result[7] == 1'b1) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02839                 end
02840                 // SBCD
02841                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b000 ) begin
02842                 
02843                     result[13:8] = 6'd32 + {2'b0, operand1[3:0]} - {2'b0, operand2[3:0]} - {5'b0, sr[4]};
02844                     result[19:14] = 6'd32 + {2'b0, operand1[7:4]} - {2'b0, operand2[7:4]};
02845                     
02846                     result[31:23] = operand1[7:0] - operand2[7:0] - {7'b0, sr[4]};
02847                     
02848                     result[13:8] = (result[13:8] < 6'd32) ? (result[13:8] - 6'd6) : result[13:8];
02849                     result[19:14] = (result[13:8] < 6'd16) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd2) :
02850                                     (result[13:8] < 6'd32) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd1) :
02851                                     result[19:14];
02852                     result[19:14] = (result[19:14] < 6'd32 && result[31] == 1'b1) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd6) : result[19:14];
02853                     
02854                     result[7:4] = result[17:14];
02855                     result[3:0] = result[11:8];
02856                 
02857                     // C
02858                     sr[0] <= (result[19:14] < 6'd32) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02859                     // X = C
02860                     sr[4] <= (result[19:14] < 6'd32) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02861                     
02862                     // V
02863                     sr[1] <= (result[30] == 1'b1 && result[7] == 1'b0) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02864                 end
02865                 // ADDX
02866                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b101 ) result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0] + sr[4];
02867                 // SUBX
02868                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b001 ) result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0] - sr[4];
02869 
02870                 // Z
02871                 sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
02872                 // N
02873                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
02874 
02875                 // ADDX
02876                 if(ir[14:12] == 3'b101 ) begin
02877                     // C,X,V
02878                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm);
02879                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm); //=ccr[0];
02880                     sr[1] <= (`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (~`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02881                 end
02882                 // SUBX
02883                 else if(ir[14:12] == 3'b001 ) begin
02884                     // C,X,V
02885                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02886                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
02887                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02888                 end
02889             end
02890 
02891             `ALU_ASL_LSL_ROL_ROXL_ASR_LSR_ROR_ROXR_prepare: begin

02925                     result[31:0] = {operand1[30:0], 1'b0};

02967                     if(size == 2'b00)         result[7:0] = { 1'b0, operand1[7:1] };
02968                     else if(size == 2'b01)    result[15:0] = { 1'b0, operand1[15:1] };

02977                     if(size == 2'b00)         result[7:0] = { operand1[0], operand1[7:1] };
02978                     else if(size == 2'b01)    result[15:0] = { operand1[0], operand1[15:1] };

03002             `ALU_MOVE: begin
03003                 result = operand1;
03004

03006                 // C cleared
03007                 sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03008                 // V cleared

03017             `ALU_ADDA_SUBA_CMPA_ADDQ_SUBQ: begin
03018                 // ADDA: 1101
03019                 // CMPA: 1011
03020                 // SUBA: 1001
03021                 // ADDQ,SUBQ: 0101 xxx0,1
03022                 // operation requires that operand2 was sign extended
03023                 
03024                 // ADDA,ADDQ
03025                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0) )
03026                     result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
03027                 // SUBA,CMPA,SUBQ
03028                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1001 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 || (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1) )
03029                     result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
03030                 
03031                 // for CMPA
03032                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 ) begin
03033                     // Z
03034                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03035                     // N
03036                     sr[3] <= `Rm;
03037 
03038                     // C,V
03039                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
03040                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03041                     // X not affected
03042                 end
03043                 // for ADDA,SUBA,ADDQ,SUBQ: ccr not affected
03044             end
03045 
03046             `ALU_CHK: begin
03047                 result[15:0] = operand1[15:0] - operand2[15:0];
03048                 
03049                 // undocumented behavior: Z flag, see 68knotes.txt
03050                 //sr[2] <= (operand1[15:0] == 16'b0) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
03051                 // undocumented behavior: C,V flags, see 68knotes.txt
03052                 //sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03053                 //sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03054                 
03055                 // C,X,V
03056                 //    sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
03057                 //    sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
03058                 //    sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03059                 // +: 0-1,    0-0=0, 1-1=0
03060                 // -: 0-0=1,  1-0,   1-1=1
03061                 // operand1 - operand2 > 0
03062                 if( operand1[15:0] != operand2[15:0] && ((~`Dm & `Sm) | (~`Dm & ~`Sm & ~`Rm) | (`Dm & `Sm & ~`Rm)) == 1'b1 ) begin
03063                     // clear N
03064                     sr[3] <= 1'b0;
03065                     special <= 2'b01;
03066                 end
03067                 // operand1 < 0
03068                 else if( operand1[15] == 1'b1 ) begin
03069                     // set N
03070                     sr[3] <= 1'b1;
03071                     special <= 2'b01;
03072                 end
03073                 // no trap
03074                 else begin
03075                     // N undefined: not affected
03076                     special <= 2'b00;
03077                 end
03078 
03079                 // X not affected
03080             end
03081 
03082             `ALU_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU: begin // 2206 LE, 106 MHz
03083 
03084                 // division by 0
03085                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && operand2[15:0] == 16'b0 ) begin
03086                     // X not affected
03087                     // C cleared
03088                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03089                     // V,Z,N undefined: cleared
03090                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03091                     sr[2] <= 1'b0;
03092                     sr[3] <= 1'b0;
03093 
03094                     // set trap
03095                     special <= 2'b01;
03096                 end
03097                 // division overflow: divu, divs
03098                 else if(     ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && ir[8] == 1'b0) && (divu_quotient[31:16] != 16'd0)) ||
03099                             ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && ir[8] == 1'b1) && (divs_quotient[31:16] != {16{divs_quotient[15]}}))
03100                 ) begin
03101                     // X not affected
03102                     // C cleared
03103                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03104                     // V set
03105                     sr[1] <= 1'b1;
03106                     // Z,N undefined: cleared and set
03107                     sr[2] <= 1'b0;
03108                     sr[3] <= 1'b1;
03109 
03110                     // set trap
03111                     special <= 2'b10;
03112                 end
03113                 // division
03114                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 ) begin
03115                     result[31:0] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? {divu_remainder[15:0], divu_quotient[15:0]} : {divs_remainder[15:0], divs_quotient[15:0]};
03116 
03117                     // X not affected
03118                     // C cleared
03119                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03120                     // V cleared
03121                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03122                     // Z
03123                     sr[2] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? (divu_quotient[15:0] == 16'b0) : (divs_quotient[15:0] == 16'b0);
03124                     // N
03125                     sr[3] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? (divu_quotient[15] == 1'b1) : (divs_quotient[15] == 1'b1);
03126 
03127                     // set trap
03128                     special <= 2'b00;
03129                 end
03130                 // multiplication
03131                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 ) begin
03132                     result[31:0] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? mulu_result[31:0] : muls_result[31:0];
03133 
03134                     // X not affected
03135                     // C cleared
03136                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03137                     // V cleared
03138                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03139                     // Z
03140                     sr[2] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? (mulu_result[31:0] == 32'b0) : (muls_result[31:0] == 32'b0);
03141                     // N
03142                     sr[3] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? (mulu_result[31] == 1'b1) : (muls_result[31] == 1'b1);
03143 
03144                     // set trap
03145                     special <= 2'b00;
03146                 end
03147             end
03148 
03149 
03150             `ALU_BCHG_BCLR_BSET_BTST: begin // 97 LE
03151                 // byte
03152                 if( ir[5:3] != 3'b000 ) begin
03153                     sr[2] <= ~(operand1[ operand2[2:0] ]);
03154                     result = operand1;
03155                     result[ operand2[2:0] ] = (ir[7:6] == 2'b01) ? ~(operand1[ operand2[2:0] ]) : (ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03156                 end
03157                 // long
03158                 else if( ir[5:3] == 3'b000 ) begin
03159                     sr[2] <= ~(operand1[ operand2[4:0] ]);
03160                     result = operand1;
03161                     result[ operand2[4:0] ] = (ir[7:6] == 2'b01) ? ~(operand1[ operand2[4:0] ]) : (ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03162                 end
03163 
03164                 // C,V,N,X not affected
03165             end
03166 
03167             `ALU_TAS: begin
03168                 result[7:0] <= { 1'b1, operand1[6:0] };
03169 
03170                 // X not affected
03171                 // C cleared
03172                 sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03173                 // V cleared
03174                 sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03175 
03176                 // N set
03177                 sr[3] <= (operand1[7] == 1'b1);
03178                 // Z set
03179                 sr[2] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'b0);
03180             end
03181 
03182 
03183             `ALU_NEGX_CLR_NEG_NOT_NBCD_SWAP_EXT: begin
03184                 // NEGX
03185                 if(    ir[11:8] == 4'b0000 ) result = 32'b0 - operand1[31:0] - sr[4];
03186                 // CLR
03187                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0010 ) result = 32'b0;
03188                 // NEG
03189                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0100 ) result = 32'b0 - operand1[31:0];
03190                 // NOT
03191                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0110 ) result = ~operand1[31:0];
03192                 // NBCD
03193                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_00 ) begin
03194                     
03195                     result[3:0] = 5'd25 - operand1[3:0];
03196                     result[7:4] = (operand1[3:0] > 4'd9) ? (5'd24 - operand1[7:4]) : (5'd25 - operand1[7:4]);
03197                     
03198                     if(sr[4] == 1'b0 && result[3:0] == 4'd9 && result[7:4] == 4'd9) begin
03199                         result[3:0] = 4'd0;
03200                         result[7:4] = 4'd0;
03201                     end
03202                     else if(sr[4] == 1'b0 && (result[3:0] == 4'd9 || result[3:0] == 4'd15)) begin
03203                         result[3:0] = 4'd0;
03204                         result[7:4] = result[7:4] + 4'd1;
03205                     end
03206                     else if(sr[4] == 1'b0) begin
03207                         result[3:0] = result[3:0] + 4'd1;
03208                     end
03209                     
03210                     //V undefined: unchanged
03211                     //Z
03212                     sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
03213                     //C,X
03214                     sr[0] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'd0 && sr[4] == 1'b0) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03215                     sr[4] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'd0 && sr[4] == 1'b0) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1; //=C
03216                 end
03217                 // SWAP
03218                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_01 ) result = { operand1[15:0], operand1[31:16] };
03219                 // EXT byte to word
03220                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_10 ) result = { result[31:16], {8{operand1[7]}}, operand1[7:0] };
03221                 // EXT word to long
03222                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_11 ) result = { {16{operand1[15]}}, operand1[15:0] };
03223 
03224                 // N set if negative else clear
03225                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03226 
03227                 // CLR,NOT,SWAP,EXT
03228                 if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0010 || ir[11:8] == 4'b0110 || ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_01 || ir[11:7] == 5'b1000_1 ) begin
03229                     // X not affected
03230                     // C,V cleared
03231                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03232                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03233                     // Z set
03234                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03235                 end
03236                 // NEGX
03237                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0000 ) begin
03238                     // C set if borrow
03239                     sr[0] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03240                     // X=C
03241                     sr[4] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03242                     // V set if overflow
03243                     sr[1] <= `Dm & `Rm;
03244                     // Z cleared if nonzero else unchanged
03245                     sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
03246                 end
03247                 // NEG
03248                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0100 ) begin
03249                     // C clear if zero else set
03250                     sr[0] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03251                     // X=C
03252                     sr[4] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03253                     // V set if overflow
03254                     sr[1] <= `Dm & `Rm;
03255                     // Z set if zero else clear
03256                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03257                 end
03258             end
03259 
03260 
03261             `ALU_SIMPLE_LONG_ADD: begin
03262                 result <= operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
03263 
03264                 // CCR not affected
03265             end
03266 
03267             `ALU_SIMPLE_LONG_SUB: begin
03268                 result <= operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
03269 
03270                 // CCR not affected
03271             end
03272 
03273             `ALU_MOVE_TO_CCR_SR_RTE_RTR_STOP_LOGIC_TO_CCR_SR: begin
03274 
03275                 // MOVE TO SR,RTE,STOP,ORI to SR,ANDI to SR,EORI to SR
03276                 if( ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_0110 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0011 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0010 ||
03277                     ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_01_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_01_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_01_111100
03278                 )         sr <= { operand1[15], 1'b0, operand1[13], 2'b0, operand1[10:8], 3'b0, operand1[4:0] };
03279                 // MOVE TO CCR,RTR,ORI to CCR,ANDI to CCR,EORI to CCR
03280                 else if(     ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_0100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0111 ||
03281                             ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_00_111100
03282                 )        sr <= { sr[15:8], 3'b0, operand1[4:0] };
03283             end
03284 
03285             `ALU_SIMPLE_MOVE: begin
03286                 result <= operand1;
03287                 
03288                 // CCR not affected
03289             end
03290             
03291             `ALU_LINK_MOVE: begin
03292                 if(ir[3:0] == 3'b111) begin
03293                     result <= operand1 - 32'd4;
03294                 end
03295                 else begin
03296                     result <= operand1;
03297                 end
03298                 
03299                 // CCR not affected
03300             end
03301 
03302         endcase
03303     end
03304 end
